summary:
Next-Gen Graphics on an 'old' game = mind blown.
'nuff said.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[font=Times New Roman][size=6]BAOM ENB[/size]
[/font][font=Times New Roman][size=4]Created by the same fat kid that made: Vibrancy ENB, Bawar ENB, Holy Vibrancy ENB, Cinematic Vibrancy ENB, Holy, Dewm ENB, Blubber ENB

We all love Skyrim. I just made this to make it better.

Look, I could go into all the 'nitty gritty' about how long this took me, how much effort I put into this, and ( as a percentage ) how many hours of the time I dedicated to this ENB was actually converscated by Porn, but hey, Life is short  - and I really can't be arsed.

Basically, this ENB makes your game look a shit tonne better, and still gives you a very good FPS for the amazing quality that this ENB grants.
'nuff Said.

[u]Don't believe me? just take a look...

[youtube]N-T_lwAWCJU[/youtube]

[youtube]vq4bRY1-O28[/youtube][/u]

[u]MODS I USE:[/u]
Extreme Grass
Skyrim HD
4k textures 
Realistic water two + watercolour for ENB
Skyrim Bigger Trees
Real Clouds
Vivid Clouds and fogs
Realistic Lighting Overhaul
Realistic Aspen Trees
Climates of Tamriel V
Seasons of Skyrim Springtime overhaul
Ultimate Lush Overhaul
4k parallax mountains

[u]INSTALLATION![/u]

ENB Series v0.308 (or the most current ENB), please download the binary files from here: [i]http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0308.htm 
[/i]
- Extract [b]d3d9.dll[/b] to your Skyrim folder. (Remove the dll file and try the InjectorVersion if you have any problems with the WrapperVersion - which you shouldnt do, but still, just in case)

- Download my mod and extract the files to your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe is located), and overwrite if asked.

NOTE: For the Climates Of Tamriel versions, the contents of the Data folder should be copied to your Skyrim/Data folder.

- Open your SkyrimPrefs.ini file located in your "My Documents" folder and make sure these lines are set:

bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
iBlurDeferredShadowMask=5 

- Open enblocal.ini and set the VideoMemorySizeMb parameter (e.g. VRAM + RAM - 2048)

- Disable AA in the SkyrimLauncher options

      Many thanks to you, you awesome people!

[size=3]  -BAWAR[/size]
[/size][/font][/center]
author: bawar
